steps: Open the Microsoft Word document Document11.docx.
Click on the 'Page Layout' tab in the ribbon.
In the 'Page Background' group, click on the 'Page Borders' button.
The 'Borders and Shading' dialog box will appear.
To add page borders, select the 'Page Border' tab.
Choose the desired border settings, such as style, color, and width.
Click on the 'OK' button to apply the page borders.
To remove page borders, select the 'None' option in the 'Setting' section.
Click on the 'OK' button to remove the page borders.
Save the changes to the document.
